articles.title: Kim Jong Un Plants Trees with Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Plants Trees with Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and planted trees with its students on Thursday, the Tree-planting Day.
					 When respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju arrived at the school, its students and teachers who were planting trees broke into cheers of "hurrah!"
					
					 He met students and kindly asked about their ages, grades and study and organizational life with fatherly love, patting their cheeks.
					
					 Saying that today is the significant Tree-planting Day when President Kim Il Sung took the lead in the tree-planting campaign, he added that students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School came into his mind when he was thinking of where he would plant trees on the significant day and he visited them.
					
					 He noted that the students of the school who are growing to be successors and backbone elements of the revolution should duly take the lead in planting trees, too.
					
					 He said that the teachers should lead the students to devote their sincerity and enthusiasm to the tree-planting with extraordinary awareness that they should display their clean conscience and ardent patriotism before planting trees and with will to take good care of woodland even if their bodies may serve as roots and base manure.
					
					 He noted that only when one has warm love for the country from one's childhood, can one become a true patriot and a genuine official desired by the Party who does any work oneself for the prosperity of the country at any post assigned to one by the Party in the future. 
					
					 He taught the students in a way easy to understand, saying it is possible to ensure the rate of rooting when trees are planted in line with the scientific and technical requirements and what is important in tree planting is not how many trees are planted but how many trees are rooted.
					
					 Then he personally planted trees for a long while, digging a hole, watering and tamping.
					
					 The students, encouraged by his guidance, hastened their work.
					
					 Looking with attention at the planted trees one by one, he praised all of the students for doing good work. He said they would recollect today, seeing the trees that grew tall when they visit this place as adults.
					
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the school clad in thick verdure, he said that the school has a thick woodland and now there may be no space for planting trees.
					
					 He told officials to let the students visit the places associated with the immortal leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il including the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and plant trees there, and tour modern Tree Nursery 122 of the Korean People's Army so that they may learn the scientific way of planting trees.
					
					 He urged the students who are growing, drinking water and breathing air in Mangyongdae to set an example in the forest restoration campaign.
					
					 He set forth tasks which would serve as guidelines for the school's upbringing and education and management and operation.
					
					 He had a photo session with the students of the school.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So and Kim Yong Su.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Bulgaria
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Rumen Radev, president of the Republic of Bulgaria, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with aspiration and desire of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Bulgarian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Bulgarian PM
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on Friday sent a message of greeting to Ognian Gerdjikov, prime minister of Bulgaria, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would expand and develop in the common interests of their peoples, the message wished him and his government success in their work for the development of the country and the well-being of the people.
					
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to his Bulgarian counterpart Radi Naidenov.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Warns U.S. of Serious Consequences of Its Groundless Accusation
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Warns U.S. of Serious Consequences of Its Groundless Accusation
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Friday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that sophism calling for re-listing the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" is heard in the U.S.: 
					 Hard-line conservatives in the U.S., including some congressmen, have called for re-listing the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" since the outset of the year.
					
					 The DPRK government had already clarified its principled stand of opposing all forms of terrorism and any support for it before the international community and has consistently proved the stand in practice.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is seeking to label the DPRK a "sponsor of terrorism" though it has nothing in common with it. This cannot be construed otherwise than an expression of inveterate repugnancy and hostile attitude towards it.
					
					 No matter how the U.S. again calls the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" in line with its standard and interests, the latter will never be a "sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could stigmatize at random to oppress those countries incurring its displeasure, while having the world under its control.
					
					 The U.S. will keenly realize how dearly it has to pay for its groundless accusations against the dignified DPRK.

articles.title: Loneliness of Park Geun Hye Is Deserved Outcome: CPRC Policy Department Spokesman
articles.content:
Loneliness of Park Geun Hye Is Deserved Outcome: CPRC Policy Department Spokesman
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the DPRK said in a statement Friday that the wretched plight of lonely dragon lady of Chongwadae is deserved outcome of her thrice-cursed crimes.
					 With her impeachment trial imminent, Park of south Korea finds herself all the more lonely and demented with her confidants getting away from her, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Her American master whom she served with total dedication also treats her like a street woman, making her plight all the more pitiful.
					
					 The successive rulers of south Korea all met miserable ends, being forsaken by the people. But none of them spent every minute in such loneliness as Park.
					
					 Such a matchless imbecile hardly worth a human being was in power, a shame and disgrace of the nation before the world.
					
					 Her wretched and pitiful plight is something she deserves for her thrice-cursed acts of treachery against the people and reunification over four years of her office. 
					
					 Only stern sledge-hammer blows of history and nation await those who go against the trend of the times and desire of people.
					
					 Park is to be recorded in history as the "president" with the most miserable end among the successive puppet rulers.
					
					 Anyone who follows in the footsteps of Park will meet the same miserable end as Park's.

articles.title: Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 3 Completed
articles.content:
Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 3 Completed
 Thosan, March 3 (KCNA) -- Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 3 was successfully completed.
					 The completion of another power station in Ryesong River provides a more solid foundation for promoting the economic development in North Hwanghae Province and improving the standard of inhabitants' living.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on the spot on Friday.

articles.title: Service Personnel Plant over 3.75 Million Trees a Day
articles.content:
Service Personnel Plant over 3.75 Million Trees a Day
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Men and officers of the Korean People's Army have turned out in a spring tree-planting drive, determined to play a vanguard role in the forest restoration campaign.
					 On March 2, Tree-planting Day, they planted more than 3.75 million trees of good species around the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and the revolutionary sites and revolutionary battle sites across the country and their barracks.

articles.title: Monochrome Film Reproduced
articles.content:
Monochrome Film Reproduced
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Film Technical Company in the DPRK has recently made the monochrome multi-part feature film "Unknown Heroes" (20 parts) into the color film.
					 The film, created from the late 1970s to the early 1980s, deals with the heroic feats performed by agents who made a contribution to the DPRK's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953).
					
					 Up to now, six parts of the film were reproduced.
					
					 The company developed a program bettering pictures and hastening the speed of coloring.
					
					 After watching the reproduced film, people are unanimous in saying that it seems a new film.

articles.title: Efforts Made for Producing New Farm Machines
articles.content:
Efforts Made for Producing New Farm Machines
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to the comprehensive mechanization of rural economy in the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Pang Song Hyon, chief engineer of the Management Bureau of Farm Machine Industry under the Ministry of Agriculture, told KCNA:
					
					 It is a national project to raise the rate of mechanization in farm work up to 60-70 percent as quickly as possible.
					
					 Recently, many successes have been made in the field of farm machine-building industry.
					
					 Scientists and technicians of the Farm Machine Institute under the Ministry of Agriculture, the Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, the Wonsan University of Agriculture and other units completed designs of farm machines suited to the physiographical features and local conditions of the country and constitution of Koreans. 
					
					 New farm machines under development are integrated machines, self-propelled, multi-purpose and multi-functional.
					
					 Meanwhile, it has been pushed forward at farm machine factories across the country to fully equip themselves with facilities for producing new farm machines.

articles.title: Development of Fishing Industry Gains Momentum
articles.content:
Development of Fishing Industry Gains Momentum
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has channeled big efforts into bringing about a decisive turn in boosting fisheries output this year.
					 The Ministry of Fisheries took measures to let fishery stations introduce rational fishing methods and put fishing on a scientific basis.
					
					 And it has been pushed forward at fishery stations across the country to keep in good condition or newly build freezing facilities and salting tanks.
					
					 Efforts are also directed to developing pelagic fishing and cultivating industry.
					
					 Offshore farms strive to increase the production of kelp by a thinning-out method and expand the area of shallow-sea culture.
					
					 The development of software for searching main fishing ground is going on at the final stage.
					
					 Meanwhile, due measures have been taken to further cement the material and technical foundations for shipbuilding bases.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun: Nobody Has Right to Fault DPRK's Bolstering of Defence Capability
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun: Nobody Has Right to Fault DPRK's Bolstering of Defence Capability
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Frightened by the successful test fire of ground-to-ground medium to long-range strategic ballistic rocket Pukguksong-2 by the DPRK, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are waging the disgusting smear campaign against the DPRK again.
					 Rodong Sinmun observes in a commentary Friday in this regard:
					
					 No one has the right to fault the DPRK's measures for steadily bolstering up its war deterrence by dint of self-reliance and self-development meant to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation's dignity.
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to possess nuclear weapons as a means for self-defense to cope with the escalating reckless nuclear war provocation of the aggression forces at home and abroad century after century. The U.S. and its followers' open attempt for aggression have made the DPRK further bolster up its nuclear force both in quality and quantity.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are describing the DPRK's bolstering of its deterrence for self-defense as "provocation", pulling it up. Such action reminds one of a thief crying "stop thief!"
					
					 Now that the hostile forces made it a fait accompli to mount a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK and are making desperate efforts to attain their aggression aims, it is quite natural that the DPRK strongly reacts to such moves with powerful countermeasures.
					
					 It is necessary to show no mercy to the reckless provokers.
					
					 Those who violate the sovereignty of the DPRK and impair its dignity even a bit can never dodge the strong retaliatory strikes of its revolutionary armed forces Dno matter who they may be and no matter where they might be.

articles.title: DPRK Will Achieve Final Victory by Dint of Self-Reliance and Self-Development: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Achieve Final Victory by Dint of Self-Reliance and Self-Development: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The world is praising the DPRK as a full-fledged military power and a nuclear and space power in the East and envying the Korean people who lead a happy life unaffected by wars that small and weak countries are subject to, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 No country in the world has defeated heinous sanctions and nuclear threat and blackmail for more than half a century and rose up to be invulnerable to create the history of victory and glory as the DPRK.
					
					 Every important event, marked by the qualitative progress in bolstering up the nuclear force, makes the Korean people feel boundless pride and self-respect as victors.
					
					 The Western people are surprised at the admirable picture of the harmonious whole that neither famous producer nor eminent actors can create or imitate, and enemies are horrified by the might of the harmonious whole of society stronger than nuclear weapons.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK who brought about the birth of a nuclear power defying the imperialists' sanctions and moves for stifling and isolating it, are now full of ardent will to build in a short period an economic power where all the benefits under socialism have come true.
					
					 It is their steadfast faith and will to achieve the final victory enough to upset the hostile forces with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Games
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Games
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The danger of nuclear war is increasing in the Korean peninsula with each passing moment owing to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers, says Minju Joson Friday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The joint military drills for aggression are a vicious challenge and intolerable mockery of the aspiration and desire of the entire Korean nation. 
					
					 They kicked off the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle at last. This goes to clearly prove that they are the heinous harassers of peace and reunification and the sworn enemies of the nation who are only keen on the war against the north and the confrontation with compatriots in the north, utterly indifferent to the peace on the Korean peninsula and the reunification of the country.
					
					 We brought to light the aggressive nature of the joint military drills since their planning and strongly demanded that they stop the adventurous war drills, while warning them more than once of the serious consequences to be entailed.
					
					 Despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, they finally kicked off the joint military drills against the north. This is a foolish action of the impudent aggressors and provocateurs as they took the road of horrible death.
					
					 The aggressors and provocateurs going reckless to hurt the DPRK will be reduced into ashes by the merciless retaliation and counteraction of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean PM for Slandering DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean PM for Slandering DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Hwang Kyo An, puppet prime minister of south Korea, in his "March 1 memorial address" harshly slandered the DPRK's bolstering up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence. Talking about "maximum development of nuclear capability," he cried for taking "strong joint defensive posture" with the U.S. and "tightening sanctions and pressure." He even groundlessly threw mud at the DPRK, while vociferating about "people's living" and "human rights".
					 He stressed the need to "respect and implement" the purport and spirit of the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, expressing the will to "further boost cooperation" with Japan to cope with the "nuclear and missile threats from the north."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Traitor Hwang's "memorial address" is a shameless jargon to cover up the huge crimes they committed by pushing the south Korean society into irrevocable chaos and catastrophe and the north-south relations into the worst crisis, and dodge criticism at home and abroad.
					
					 He reeled off a litany of vitriol dispraising the dignity and social system of the DPRK, revealing his ambition for "unification under liberal democracy" through "change" of the north. His reckless remarks are infamies of a psychopath unaware of his poor position to be ousted together with Park Geun Hye.
					
					 It is disgrace of the nation that rare confrontation maniacs and traitors like Park Geun Hye and Hwang Kyo An are still left intact in south Korea.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Hwang Kyo An's Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Hwang Kyo An's Remarks
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Hwang Kyo An, puppet acting president of south Korea, in his "March 1 memorial address" viciously hurled mud at the DPRK, inciting confrontation and called for sycophancy toward the U.S. and Japan.
					 From the beginning of his address, he took issues with nuclear program and "human rights" of the DPRK, saying that "the north is directing all the efforts to developing nuclear capability to the maximum including nuclear test and ballistic missile launch being indifferent to the people's living." He even clamored for "making the north understand the uselessness of nuclear weapons by redoubling the deterrent and defensive capabilities of south Korea-U.S. alliance through THAAD deployment, etc." He stressed the need to "respect and implement the purport and spirit of the agreement on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army."
					
					 These are despicable remarks consistent with provocation to the DPRK and sycophancy toward the U.S. and Japan, oblivious of his position directly responsible for the case of scandalous "state administration" of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The March First Popular Uprising held in Pyongyang on March 1, 1919 was a nationwide patriotic resistance against Japan as the Korean people resolutely turned out in the righteous struggle to regain the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the country deprived of by the vicious Japanese imperialists.
					
					 From the viewpoint of his career as a top-class servant for traitor Park Geun Hye and his constitutional nature as traitor, Hwang Kyo An is human scum without qualifications and face to take part in the memorial service for the March First Popular Uprising which displayed the Korean nation's strong spirit of independence, indomitable stamina and ardent patriotism.
					
					 If Hwang has an elementary thinking ability, it would be normal for him to keep mum and look back upon the poor position and the crimes against the nation even on that single day. 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapons are an emblem of independence and dignity of the nation and a treasured sword for peace and reunification and wealth for eternal happiness and prosperity of the Korean nation.
					
					 Thanks to its nuclear deterrent for self-defence, peace and security of the Korean peninsula are protected and the destiny of the nation is guaranteed despite the evermore increasing nuclear threats from the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 Indifferent to this fact, Hwang is busy introducing nuclear weapons of the U.S., serious threat to the destiny of the nation, into south Korea at random. It is the height of impudence for Hwang to slander the DPRK, being unaware of where he stands.
					
					 He vociferated about the implementation of the "agreement on the issue of comfort women", keeping silence about the reckless behavior of Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation which is desperately trying to erase the past crimes including the sexual slavery. This has brought to light his despicable nature as the worst traitor and pro-Japanese lackey devoid of blood and soul of the nation.
					
					 The confrontation maniac is driving the situation to the brink of war by staging the dangerous nuclear saber-rattling in collusion with the U.S., while pushing forward THAAD deployment and supporting the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. This is just like a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 Hwang reeled off a litany of vitriol dispraising the dignity and social system of the DPRK, thereby revealing his daydream for "unification by absorption". His reckless remarks are an infamy of a psychopath unaware of his poor position to be ousted together with Park Geun Hye.
					
					 It is a tragedy and disgrace of the nation that such rare confrontation maniacs and human scum are still alive.
					
					 Although Hwang and other traitors make last-ditch efforts to get rid of the ruinous destiny through vitriol and confrontation rackets, their time is drawing near.

articles.title: Fundamental Settlement of Sexual Slavery Issue Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fundamental Settlement of Sexual Slavery Issue Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- According to south Korean Yonhap News on Mar. 1, the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1 272nd Wednesday rally in Seoul in demand of the nullification of the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, and its fundamental solution.
					 Speakers at the rally condemned Park Geun Hye for working hard to keep the sexual slavery buried into oblivion, yielding to Japan's demand for the removal of the statue of girl sexual slave.
					
					 A statement, released at the rally, slammed the puppet authorities for taking a humiliating attitude towards Japan's demand for the removal of the statue of girl sexual slave standing before Japan's consulate general in Pusan.

articles.title: Deployment of THAAD Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deployment of THAAD Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Actions took place across south Korea in protest against the deployment of THAAD, according to press reports.
					 As soon as it was reported on Feb. 27 that Lotte group decided to offer its golf course in Songju as the site for THAAD deployment and made a contract on site exchange with the puppet defense ministry, the Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment held a candlelight meeting outside the Songju County Office that day.
					
					 The participants expressed their will to continue the struggle against THAAD deployment to the last.
					
					 They decided to wage a legal struggle and take a swift countermeasure whenever the defense ministry shows a new move.
					
					 They declared that they would check the deployment of THAAD by putting under control the road leading to the Songju Golf Course and disturbing the freight transport.
					
					 Similar actions were also staged in other parts of south Korea.

articles.title: Resignation of FM Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of FM Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean Yonhap News on Feb. 28, the Pusan Citizens' Action for Defending the Statue of Girl called a news conference outside Japan's consulate general in Pusan, urging the puppet foreign minister to step down for pressurizing the removal of the statue of girl sexual slave.
					 Recalling that the puppet foreign ministry sent the Pusan City authorities an official notice calling for the virtual transfer of the girl statue, speakers at the conference termed it an action quite contrary to the public opinion that Japan should make a sincere apology for the sexual slavery.

articles.title: Protest Action Staged in Taejon of S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest Action Staged in Taejon of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Members of organizations and other citizens of different social standings in Taejon of south Korea staged a protest action on Wednesday, the 98th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 The participants deplored that nearly a century has passed since the popular uprising but Korea has not achieved the complete independence.
					
					 They demanded that the authorities totally scrap the "agreements" with Japan on the sexual slavery issue and protecting military intelligence and opt for achieving peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Germany
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Group Formed in Germany
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The Dresden Group for the Study of the Juche Idea was formed in Germany on February 9.
					 Markus Boehmer was elected its chairman.
					
					 At its inaugural ceremony attended by personages of political and social circles and adherents to the Juche idea in Germany, speakers said that they were pleased to form the group on the occasion of the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They noted that it is bounden duty of the progressive people to study and disseminate and apply in practice the Juche idea, the Songun idea brightly showing the road ahead of the human cause of independence.
					
					 They stressed that the validity and vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea are evidently proven by the fact that the ranks of its followers are steadily increasing worldwide though the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces get more frantic in their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 A message of greeting to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Events took place at the DPRK missions abroad to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included celebration meetings, friendly meetings, receptions, book, photo and handicraft exhibitions and film shows at the DPRK missions in Peru, Brazil, Venezuela, Mexico, Kuwait, South Africa, Equatorial Guinea, Guinea, Ethiopia, Senegal, Egypt, Nigeria, DR Congo, Uganda and Algeria, the DPRK permanent mission at the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN between February 3 and 16.
					
					 Displayed at their venues were photos showing the revolutionary careers and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also o works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and books and photos and handicraft introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Such Korean films as "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World" were shown.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and art works depicting the great leaders standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru said that the DPRK turned into a politico-ideological and military power, envied by the world, thanks to the independent politics, the Songun politics shaped by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The permanent secretary of the Guinean People's Assembly said that Kim Jong Il is the great master in ideology and leadership as he clearly showed the road ahead of the African people aspiring after independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Works Introduced in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Works Introduced in Britain
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Occasion of the Founding of the Korean People's Army" and leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism" on February 10 and 22.
					 "On the Occasion of the Founding of the Korean People's Army", published on February 8, Juche 37 (1948), indicates the main objective of the birth of the Korean People's Army, its character and tasks for strengthening it.
					
					 "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism", published in February Juche 91 (2002), deals with the birth and essence of nationalism and the past view on it and the important matters arising in achieving the independent development of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un planta arboles en la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un planta arboles en la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia 2 la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y planto los arboles junto con los estudiantes en ocasion del Dia de Reforestacion.
					Cuando el Maximo Dirigente llego con Ri Sol Ju a la escuela los estudiantes y profesores quienes estaban plantando arboles les acogieron con estruendosas aclamaciones de "!Viva!"
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se acerco a los estudiantes y les pregunto con el amor paternal la edad que tienen, el grado en que estudian y el estado de estudio y vida organizativa.
					
					Hoy es el Dia de Reforestacion en que el Presidente Kim Il Sung dio iniciativa del movimiento de la plantacion de arboles, dijo y continuo que queria plantar los arboles en este dia significativo y se dirigia a esta escuela pensando en los alumnos.
					
					Senalo que los alumnos de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae, que se crecen como los sucesores y pilares de revolucion, deben ponerse debidamente al frente de la repoblacion forestal.
					
					Senalo que los profesores deben hacer que los alumnos dediquen antes que todo su sinceridad y fervor a la plantacion de arboles con la firme posicion de dedicar la conciencia pura y el alma patriotica y la voluntad de cultivar con todo lo suyo el bosque verde.
					
					Solo cuando los alumnos posean desde su ninez el ardiente amor a la patria pueden ser en el futuro los verdaderos patriotas y los funcionarios utiles deseados por el partido quienes hacen voluntariamente los trabajos por la prosperidad de la patria en los puestos encargados por el partido.
					
					Enseno detalladamente a los alumnos los metodos de plantacion diciendo que hay que plantar los arboles conforme a las exigencias cientificas y tecnicas para asegurar la proporcion de radicacion y que lo importante no esta en la cantidad de arboles plantados, sino en el aseguramiento de radicacion, mientras que durante largo tiempo hizo personalmente los trabajos de cavar, echar agua y apisonar la tierra. 
					
					 Bajo las instrucciones del Maximo Dirigente, los alumnos aceleraron animadamente el trabajo.
					
					Observando uno tras otro los arboles plantados, el Maximo Dirigente dijo que todos plantaron bien los arboles y si vienen aqui despues de muchos anos, pudieran recordar hoy mirando los arboles crecidos con frondosidad.
					
					Al mirar con satisfaccion el panorama de la escuela hallada en el frondoso bosque asevero que esta cubierta de arboles tupidas, no habria un lugar de plantar y agrego que los alumnos de esta escuela plantaran los arboles en el contorno del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan y otros lugares donde estan guardadas las huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. Hablo de la necesidad de mostrar a los alumnos la moderna Almaciga No. 122 del EPC y ensenarles los cientificos metodos de plantacion. Y encomendo que los estudiantes de esta escuela que se crecen con el agua y aire de Mangyongdae debieran ser ejemplares en la reforestacion.
					
					Presento las tareas que sirven de guia en la educacion y gestion de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se fotografio junto con los alumnos de escuela.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So y Kim Yong Su.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana se reune con los funcionarios chinos de Relaciones Exteriores
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana se reune con los funcionarios chinos de Relaciones Exteriores
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- Durante su visita a la Republica Popular China, la delegacion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el viceministro Ri Kil Song, se reunio con el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Wang Yi, y sostuvo conversaciones por separados con el vicecanciller Liu Zhenmin y el asistente al ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kong Xuanyou.
					Ambas partes coincidieron en que la amistad Corea-China fue preparada y desarrollada por los lideres de generacion veterana de ambos paises y establecida a costa de la sangre derramada por los pueblos de ambos paises en la lucha conjunta contra el imperialismo.
					
					Consintieron que conviene a los intereses de ambas partes desarrollar generacion tras generacion la amistad Corea-China, patrimonio comun de los dos pueblos, y discutieron profundamente los problemas por el respecto.
					
					Intercambiaron francamente los criterios sobre los asuntos de interes mutuo tales como la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Comite Coreano por Medidas condena intento de anular tema de esclavitud sexual
articles.content:
Comite Coreano por Medidas condena intento de anular tema de esclavitud sexual
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- Ahora, se tornan mas graves las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses para anular el problema de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones, por una parte, y por la otra, asumen una actitud adulona y sumisa los titeres surcoreanos.
					 Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por Medidas sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso publico el dia 2 una declaracion que continua:
					
					 Como ya trascendidos, desde el principio del ano nuevo, los reaccionarios japoneses demandan a los titeres surcoreanos el desalojo de las estatuas de nina esclava sexual para el viejo ejercito japones, instaladas ante la embajada japonesa en Seul y el consulado general del mismo pais en Pusan.
					
					  Ademas, retiraron del Sur de Corea al embajador y al consul general e imponen la cancelacion del plan de levantamiento de la estatua de nina en el islote Tok, que impulsa la provincia de Kyonggi, urgiendo a los titeres surcoreanos que cambien el nombre de ella como "estatua de consoladora".
					
					  Insistiendo absurdamente en que si no remueven las estatuas, no retornaran su embajador y consul general, obligan casi todos los dias a la parte surcoreana a implementar el "acuerdo de consoladoras" con los chismes como que "no hay datos que comprueban el arresto forzado del ejercito japones" y "no esperen la normalizacion de las relaciones Japon-Sur de Corea sin que haya los movimientos para desalojar las estatuas de nina".
					
					  En lugar de pedir disculpas a la nacion coreana, los reaccionarios japoneses se portan asi partiendo de su logica de bandido y gran cinismo.
					
					  Lo mas problematico es la conducta abominable de la banda titere surcoreana que se muestra mas vil sin refutar la descarada demanda de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					  El canciller Yun Pyong Se y otros vendepatrias del Sur de Corea adulan a los reaccionarios japoneses diciendo que "respetaran y ejecutaran sinceramente el acuerdo de consoladoras" y "consultaran activamente con Japon por varios canales diplomaticos".
					
					  Para colmo, despacharon a las entidades autonomas locales hasta la nota oficial secreta que contiene este parrafo: "es necesario recoger los criterios inteligentes para discutir el proyecto de trasladar la estatua de nina al lugar adecuado".
					
					  A pesar de la fuerte protesta y censura de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea, disparatean que las autoridades tienen la posicion de que "instalar alguna estatua ante la legacion diplomatica no conviene a las costumbres internacionales alusivas a la proteccion de ella".
					
					  Insatisfechas de haber tolerado los crimenes del pasado cometidos por los imperialistas nipones al firmar el humillante "acuerdo" sobre el problema de esclavitud sexual, las autoridades titeres surcoreanas obedecen ahora a las demandas descaradas del pais isla. Este hecho deja conocer que ellas son "5 Traidores de Ulsa" de version moderna y elementos vendepatrias colmados del servilismo a grandes potencias.
					
					  En nombre de la nacion, hay que enterrar en la tumba de la historia a esos traidores que hasta en los ultimos momentos de su vida politica, no dejan de vender la dignidad e intereses nacionales a los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					  Toda la nacion coreana cobrara a toda costa las disculpas e indemnizacion por todas las barbaridades anti-eticas, cometidas por Japon en el siglo pasado contra el pueblo coreano, luchando con el espiritu e impetu manifestados durante el Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo.

articles.title: Park Geun-hye merece ser abandonada, insiste portavoz del Departamento de Politica del CRPP
articles.content:
Park Geun-hye merece ser abandonada, insiste portavoz del Departamento de Politica del CRPP
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 3 una declaracion titulada "La miserable situacion de la aislada diabla de Chongwadae es resultado merecido de sus imperdonables crimenes sin precedentes".
					Puesto que se acerca a la vista el momento final de la vida politica de Park Geun-hye, o sea, la sentencia de su dimision, ella esta por volverse loca siendo abandonada por todos, inclusos por sus colaboradores cercanos, senala la nota y continua:
					
					Hasta el patron norteamericano, al que ella ha servido con toda su alma, la trata como a una prostituta callejera.
					
					Aunque fue siempre tragico el destino de los sucesivos gobernantes surcoreanos, abandonados por la opinion publica, no hubo el mas miserable que Park Geun-hye quien sufre la soledad terrible esperando cada momento su fin tragico.
					
					Esta escoria humana tan imbecil estuvo ocupando el poder hasta la fecha, lo cual deviene una verguenza nacional y del mundo entero.
					
					La situacion pobre de Park es el castigo divino al expediente de sus imperdonables crimenes cometidos durante 4 anos de su mandato contra el pueblo, la nacion y la causa de reunificacion.
					
					A los tipejos que desafian a la corriente y la opinion publica, les corresponde el castigo severo de la historia y la nacion.
					
					Park Geun-hye tendra el estigma de gobernante con el fin mas tragico entre los sucesivos mandatarios surcoreanos y de primera "presidenta" expulsada del poder en la historia de la politica surcoreana.
					
					Si alguien repite el antecedente de Park, tendra un fin tan tragico como ella.
